channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 腾讯砍掉 Square Enix 的《尼尔》手机游戏，寻找新的热门游戏 - 消息人士
item.description: Tencent halted the development of a highly anticipated mobile game based on Square Enix's "Nier" franchise in December, according to three people with knowledge of the matter, marking a setback in the Chinese gaming giant's hunt for new hits.翻译:据三名知情人士透露，腾讯去年 12 月停止了一款基于 Square Enix 的《尼尔》系列的备受期待的手机游戏的开发，这标志着这家中国游戏巨头寻找新热门游戏的进程遭遇挫折。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 日本经济可能在第四季度恢复增长，但仍然脆弱：路透调查
item.description: Japan's economy likely swung back to growth in the October-December period, helped by a slight pickup in external demand, though analysts warned private consumption remains fragile, a Reuters poll showed on Friday.翻译:路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，在外部需求小幅回升的帮助下，日本经济可能在 10 月至 12 月期间恢复增长，但分析师警告称，私人消费仍然脆弱。
item.author: Satoshi Sugiyama

item.title: 朝鲜在首尔西海岸发射巡航导弹
item.description: North Korea fired multiple cruise missiles off its west coast on Friday, South Korea's military said, marking the fourth time in just over a week that Pyongyang has launched such missiles off both coasts.翻译:韩国军方表示，朝鲜周五在其西海岸发射了多枚巡航导弹，这是平壤在一周多的时间里第四次在两国海岸发射了此类导弹。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 亚洲股市因美国科技股反弹而上涨，就业成为焦点
item.description: Asian shares were buoyed by a late bounce in U.S. tech on Friday as results from Meta and Amazon beat expectations, while investors are bracing for U.S. jobs figures, which could hasten bets for rate cuts if they come in below forecast.翻译:由于 Meta 和亚马逊的业绩超出预期，周五美国科技股尾盘反弹提振亚洲股市，而投资者正在为美国就业数据做好准备，如果数据低于预期，可能会加速降息的押注。
item.author: Stella Qiu

item.title: 日本向唐纳德·特朗普传达的信息：不要与中国达成协议
item.description: Japan has been trying to send a message to US presidential hopeful Donald Trump: don't try to strike any deal with China that could upend years of collective efforts to rein in Beijing.翻译:日本一直试图向美国总统候选人唐纳德·特朗普传达一个信息：不要试图与中国达成任何可能颠覆多年来遏制北京的集体努力的协议。
item.author: John Geddie, Tim Kelly, Yoshifumi Takemoto

item.title: 美元每周下跌；美国就业数据成为焦点
item.description: The dollar fell broadly on Friday as upbeat big tech earnings on Wall Street boosted investors' appetite for riskier assets, while traders awaited U.S. job data later in the day to gauge how soon the Federal Reserve could begin easing interest rates.翻译:周五美元普遍下跌，原因是华尔街大型科技公司的乐观盈利提振了投资者对风险资产的兴趣，而交易员则等待当天晚些时候的美国就业数据，以判断美联储多久可以开始降息。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 由于中国销售滞后，苹果 iPhone 目标比华尔街目标低数十亿美元
item.description: Apple on Thursday forecast a drop in iPhone sales and targeted overall revenue $6 billion below Wall Street expectations as its China business took a hit.翻译:苹果公司周四预测，由于中国业务受到打击，iPhone 销量将下降，总收入目标将低于华尔街预期 60 亿美元。
item.author: Stephen Nellis

item.title: 因担心中国而导致预算超支30%后，印度将继续在边境公路上投入资金
item.description: India's government will maintain increased funding to build roads near its China border after spending 30% more on them this fiscal year than planned, it said on Thursday, citing tension between the two nuclear-armed neighbours.翻译:印度政府周四表示，由于这两个拥核邻国之间的紧张关系，印度政府将继续增加资金用于修建靠近中国边境的公路，本财年的公路建设支出比计划多出 30%。
item.author: Krishn Kaushik

item.title: 加拿大鹅依靠中国奢侈品需求复苏预测季度强劲
item.description: Canada Goose Holdings , forecast fourth-quarter revenue above analysts' estimates on Thursday, as the luxury goods maker bets on a sharp rebound in crucial market China to help ride out a slowdown in the U.S.翻译:加拿大鹅控股公司 (Canada Goose Holdings) 周四预测第四季度收入高于分析师预期，这家奢侈品制造商押注中国这一重要市场的大幅反弹，将有助于渡过美国经济放缓的难关
item.author: Aatrayee Chatterjee, Ananya Mariam Rajesh

item.title: 独家：中国要求乌克兰将其公司从“战争赞助者”名单中删除
item.description: China demanded on Thursday that Ukraine immediately remove more than a dozen Chinese companies from a list of firms designated as "international sponsors of war", saying it wanted Kyiv to "eliminate negative impacts".翻译:中国周四要求乌克兰立即将十几家中国公司从被指定为“国际战争赞助者”的公司名单中删除，并表示希望基辅“消除负面影响”。
item.author: Tom Balmforth, Pavel Polityuk, Liz Lee

item.title: 旅游业复苏，香港 12 月零售额增长 7.8%
item.description: Hong Kong's retail sales rose for the 13th consecutive month in December as tourism continued to improve, official data showed on Thursday.翻译:周四官方数据显示，由于旅游业持续改善，香港 12 月份零售额连续 13 个月增长。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾选出议会议长执政党观点亲中
item.description: Taiwan's parliament on Thursday elected a former presidential candidate for the largest opposition party as its new speaker, who will be responsible for hosting visiting foreign lawmakers and who the ruling party has said is pro-China.翻译:台湾议会周四选举最大反对党的前总统候选人为新议长，他将负责接待来访的外国议员，执政党称他是亲中国的。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：英伟达面向中国的新型人工智能芯片将以与华为产品相似的价格出售
item.description: Nvidia has started taking pre-orders for a new China-specific artificial intelligence (AI) chip from distributors who are pricing it on par with a rival product from Huawei, sources familiar with the matter said.翻译:知情人士称，英伟达已开始接受经销商预订一款新的中国专用人工智能芯片，这些芯片的定价与华为的竞争对手产品相当。
item.author: Yelin Mo, Brenda Goh

item.title: 美国称越南稀土产量随中国经济增长而下降
item.description: The U.S. geological agency has sharply revised down estimates on Vietnam's rare earths output and expects a further drop despite its rich resource base, according to an annual report, which showed a rise in dominant producer China's output.翻译:根据一份年度报告，美国地质机构大幅下调了对越南稀土产量的预估，并预计尽管越南资源基础丰富，但产量仍将进一步下降，该报告显示，主要生产国中国的产量有所增加。
item.author: Francesco Guarascio

item.title: 菲律宾计划购买潜艇以捍卫南海主权——高级官员
item.description: Philippines President Ferdinand Marcos Jr has approved the third phase of the military's modernisation, which includes the purchase of the country's first submarine, in order to defend its maritime sovereignty in the disputed South China Sea.翻译:菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯已批准军队现代化的第三阶段，其中包括购买该国第一艘潜艇，以捍卫其在有争议的南中国海的海洋主权。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车将停止资助 Polestar，可能将股份转让给吉利
item.description: Volvo Cars said on Thursday it would stop funding Polestar Automotive Holding and was handing responsibility for the struggling luxury car brand over to Volvo's top shareholder China's Geely Holding.翻译:沃尔沃汽车周四表示，将停止向北极星汽车控股公司提供资金，并将这个陷入困境的豪华汽车品牌的责任移交给沃尔沃最大股东中国吉利控股公司。
item.author: Marie Mannes

item.title: 人权观察就中国强迫劳工风险向汽车制造商发出警告
item.description: Human Rights Watch urged automakers such as Tesla, Volkswagen and BYD to do more to ensure materials that could be made using Uyghur forced labour do not enter their supply chain.翻译:人权观察敦促特斯拉、大众和比亚迪等汽车制造商采取更多措施，确保可能使用维吾尔族强迫劳动制造的材料不会进入其供应链。
item.author: Brenda Goh

item.title: 香港法院以2019年冲击立法会后骚乱罪判处四人有罪
item.description: A Hong Kong court on Thursday found four people guilty of rioting after the legislature of the financial centre was stormed during pro-democracy protests in 2019, joining eight others who had pleaded guilty to charges over the incident.翻译:周四，香港一家法院认定四人犯有 2019 年民主抗议活动期间冲击金融中心立法机关后发生的骚乱罪，另外八人也承认了对该事件的指控。
item.author: Jessie Pang, Edward Cho

item.title: 中国承诺坚持财政扩张以刺激经济
item.description: China will maintain fiscal expansion this year to spur an economic recovery, Vice Finance Minister Wang Dongwei said on Thursday, reinforcing market views that public spending will be the government's main tool to lift growth.翻译:财政部副部长王东伟周四表示，中国今年将维持财政扩张，以刺激经济复苏，这强化了市场观点，即公共支出将是政府拉动经济增长的主要工具。
item.author: Kevin Yao, Ellen Zhang

item.title: 中国房地产业的下滑可能正在放缓，但尚未复苏
item.description: China's new home prices rose at the fastest monthly pace in nearly 2-1/2 years and government land sales ended a 23-month slump, according to recent government data and a survey, indicating the rate of decline in the embattled property sector may be slowing down.翻译:根据最近的政府数据和一项调查，中国新房价格以近 2-1/2 年来最快的月度涨幅，政府土地销售结束了 23 个月的低迷，这表明陷入困境的房地产行业的下降速度可能是慢下来。
item.author: Liangping Gao, Ryan Woo
